short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects Azure DevOps from the old {org}.visualstudio.com/{project} domain to dev.azure.com/{org}/{project}

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome\Edge extension that redirects Azure Devops users from the old {org}.visualstudio.com/{project} domain, to the new dev.azure.com/{org}/{project}

Read more about it in the following article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/introducing-azure-devops/

Source:
https://github.com/eliagrady/Azure-Devops-Redirect
